About.description: I design and build high-quality, functional and user-oriented web solutions, by applying concepts of accessibility, responsiveness and aesthetic design.
About.heading1: My name is Germ√°n and I am a

Skills.description: Since I started developing, almost 5 years ago, I have worked and learned many technologies and methodologies, starting with Visual Basic at IPLUSB S.A., my first job.
Skills.description2: Then as a co-analyst, developer and tester at ALTOCOM S.R.L. I have worked with Oracle APEX, Oracle Database and PL/SQL. At last, but not least, i learned JavaScript by my own in order to satisfy the customer needs.
Skills.description3: At VTEX I have had one of the biggest challenge, learning TypeScript, React with Hooks, GraphQL and NodeJS to be able to develop applications and give support  to customers and partners. As a leader I had to improve my team management by implementing Scrum as an agile methodology and defining workflows with the other teams we support.
Skills.description4: Currently at VALTECH I have a challenge that I am excited to have, get back to the code, apply what I have learned as developer at VTEX and learn much more to create innovative solutions.
Skills.description5: At the same, I have been studying since 2016 at Universidad Nacional de Avellaneda to be a Software Engineer.

Trainings.heading: Here you can view the trainings I did...and the ones I will continue to do.
Trainings.description: Giving training is one of the things I enjoy the most and where I can internalize knowledge by helping others to be better in the process.
